alert.note: Alert for Lake (Indiana) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Chicago (Northeastern Illinois and Northwestern Indiana)
info.headline: Winter Storm Warning issued January 23 at 12:58PM EST until January 23 at 4:00PM EST by NWS Chicago
info.description: ...WINTER STORM WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 3 PM CST THIS AFTERNOON... * WHAT...Heavy lake effect snow. Additional snow accumulations of 1 to 3 inches. Total snow accumulations of 5 to 9 inches, highest across northern Lake County. * WHERE...Lake IN County. * WHEN...Until 3 PM CST this afternoon. * IMPACTS...Plan on slippery road conditions. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS...A heavy lake effect snow band with sharply reduced visibility will slowly move across Lake County early this afternoon. Snowfall rates of over one inch per hour are likely. North winds gusting to 25 mph will also produce some blowing snow.
info.instruction: If you must travel, keep an extra flashlight, food, and water in your vehicle in case of an emergency. The latest road conditions for Indiana are available by calling 1- 800-261-7623.
